dashboard.label: Tutorial Old
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_aTJlE1Ri":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":8,"columnFormat":{"Revenue":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("Revenue") | formatByType(RevenueColumnFormatEditorConfig)"},"Purchases":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("Purchases") | formatByType(PurchasesColumnFormatEditorConfig)","rowColors":"> table | seriesByName("Purchases") | rangeValue(PurchasesRowColorsEditorConfig)"}},"backgroundColor":"transparent","tableFormat":{"rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByIndex(0) | pick(tableAltRowBackgroundColorsByBackgroundColor)","headerBackgroundColor":"> backgroundColor | setColorChannel(tableHeaderBackgroundColorConfig)","rowColors":"> rowBackgroundColors | maxContrast(tableRowColorMaxContrast)","headerColor":"> headerBackgroundColor | maxContrast(tableRowColorMaxContrast)"}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_ElnI4rip"},"context":{"RevenueColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":true,"unitPosition":"before","precision":2}},"PurchasesColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":false,"unitPosition":"after"}},"PurchasesRowColorsEditorConfig":[{"value":"#D41F1F","to":2},{"value":"#D94E17","from":2,"to":200},{"value":"#CBA700","from":200,"to":220},{"value":"#669922","from":220,"to":230},{"value":"#118832","from":230}]}},"viz_nctBgEMK":{"type":"splunk.pie","options":{"labelDisplay":"valuesAndPercentage","showDonutHole":true,"backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_vi26WU3b"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.setToken","options":{"tokens":[{"token":"game","key":"row.Game.value"}]}}],"title":"Revenue for $game$","description":"Select a game to display revenue."},"viz_UwEResxu":{"type":"splunk.column","options":{"stackMode":"stacked","legendDisplay":"bottom","backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_7kYLQEg1"}},"viz_7a8oOQHD":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"backgroundColor":"transparent","unitPosition":"before","unit":"$"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_zTHvnFUB"}},"viz_Gmt26roa":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"### Revenue
"}},"viz_7PSzhu41":{"type":"splunk.map","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_I6ZhJN2N"},"options":{"center":[35,-100],"zoom":2}},"viz_NbQUqyMK":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"#### Purchase Locations"}},"viz_NO53mmao":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"# Buttercup Games Online Store"}},"viz_lYCRgvbF":{"type":"splunk.ellipse","options":{"fillOpacity":0.2,"fillColor":"#000000"}},"viz_6PS9IpPT":{"type":"splunk.image","options":{"src":"/en-US/static/app/splunk4champions2/images/ButtercupMascotDashStudio.png"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_ElnI4rip":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=s4c_tutorial action=purchase status=200 
| stats count as Purchases by productName price
| table productName Purchases price
| eval Revenue=Purchases*price
| table productName Purchases Revenue
| sort -Purchases | rename productName as "Game"
| head 8","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-30d@d","latest":"now"}},"name":"Most Purchased Games"},"ds_vi26WU3b":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=s4c_tutorial sourcetype=access_* action=purchase status=200 categoryId="$category$"

| stats count values(price) as Price by productName productId 
| table productName productId count Price
| eval revenue=count*Price 
| fields productName revenue
| rename productName as "Game" revenue as "Revenue" 
| sort -Revenue","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-30d@d","latest":"now"}},"name":"ds_revenue_by_game"},"ds_7kYLQEg1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=s4c_tutorial sourcetype=access_* status=200 action=purchase categoryId!=NULL | fields _time categoryId clientip | timechart count by categoryId","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-30d@d","latest":"now"}},"name":"Purchase Trends"},"ds_zTHvnFUB":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_vi26WU3b","query":"| search Game="$game$"
| stats sum(Revenue) as "Total Revenue"
"},"name":"Total Revenue"},"ds_I6ZhJN2N":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=s4c_tutorial sourcetype=access_* action=purchase status=200 productName="*"
| iplocation clientip
| geostats latfield=lat longfield=lon count by categoryId","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":""}},"name":"Purchase Locations"},"ds_l8PRH73O":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=tutorial sourcetype=access_* action=purchase status=200 
| stats count by categoryId","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0","latest":""}},"name":"Games Categories"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}},"visualizations":{"splunk.column":{"options":{"xAxisTitleVisibility":"hide"}}},"tokens":{"default":{"game":{"value":"SIM Cubicle"}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"2022-09-01T00:00:00.000Z,2022-09-12T00:00:00.000Z"},"title":"Global Time Range"},"input_JcVrSNUZ":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"defaultValue":"*","token":"category"},"title":"Select Game Category","type":"input.dropdown","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_l8PRH73O"}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","width":1300,"height":700,"backgroundImage":{"sizeType":"contain","x":0,"y":0,"src":"/en-US/static/app/splunk4champions2/images/ButtercupGames_RectanglesBG2png.png"}},"structure":[{"item":"viz_aTJlE1Ri","type":"block","position":{"x":30,"y":90,"w":480,"h":320}},{"item":"viz_nctBgEMK","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":420,"w":610,"h":270}},{"item":"viz_UwEResxu","type":"block","position":{"x":650,"y":430,"w":620,"h":260}},{"item":"viz_7a8oOQHD","type":"block","position":{"x":270,"y":570,"w":110,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_Gmt26roa","type":"block","position":{"x":290,"y":550,"w":70,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_7PSzhu41","type":"block","position":{"x":750,"y":60,"w":520,"h":330}},{"item":"viz_NbQUqyMK","type":"block","position":{"x":750,"y":30,"w":480,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_NO53mmao","type":"block","position":{"x":30,"y":30,"w":350,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_lYCRgvbF","type":"block","position":{"x":560,"y":310,"w":150,"h":86}},{"item":"viz_6PS9IpPT","type":"block","position":{"x":470,"y":90,"w":300,"h":300}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp","input_JcVrSNUZ"]},"description":"","title":"ButtercupStudio"}
